name: PHLivePhotoRequestOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the delivery of Live Photo assets you request from an image manager.

items.name: var version: PHImageRequestOptionsVersion
items.desc: The version of the Live Photo to be requested.

items.name: var deliveryMode: PHImageRequestOptionsDeliveryMode
items.desc: The requested Live Photo quality and delivery priority.

items.name: var isNetworkAccessAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested Live Photo data from iCloud.

items.name: var progressHandler: PHAssetImageProgressHandler?
items.desc: A block that Photos calls periodically while downloading the Live Photo.
